entities.name: webapp-project
observations: React 18 frontend with TypeScript
Node.js/Express backend API
PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
Deployed on AWS ECS with CloudFront CDN
Uses GitHub Actions for CI/CD

entities.name: user-preferences
observations: Prefers functional components over class components
Uses 2-space indentation
Favors named exports over default exports
Likes descriptive variable names over abbreviations
Prefers async/await over .then() chains

entities.name: auth-service
observations: Located in src/services/auth/
Uses JWT with RS256 algorithm
Refresh tokens stored in HttpOnly cookies
Access tokens expire after 15 minutes
Has rate limiting: 5 login attempts per minute

entities.name: database-schema
observations: Users table has soft delete via deleted_at column
All tables use UUID primary keys
Audit log table tracks all mutations
Uses database-level encryption for PII fields

entities.name: team-conventions
observations: PR titles must follow conventional commits format
All new endpoints require OpenAPI documentation
Feature flags managed via LaunchDarkly
Error codes follow pattern: DOMAIN_ACTION_ERROR
